snippet: Sloane Stephens, a 19-year-old unseeded American, defeated Mathilde Johansson of France in straight sets to advance to the fourth round.
abstract: Unseeded American Sloane Stephens defeats Mathilde Johansson to advance to the women's fourth round at the French Open; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Sloane Stephens, a 19-year-old unseeded American, defeated Mathilde Johansson of France in straight sets to advance to the fourth round.

headline.main: In Face of Success and Scrutiny, a Rising American Star Hasn’t Flinched
headline.print_headline: In Face of Success and Scrutiny, a Rising American Star Hasn’t Flinched
